body.p:
State of Pennsylvania
City and County of Philadephia SS.

Be it remembered that on this Second day of July One Thousand Eight Hundred and Sixty Four at the City and County of Philadelphia State of Pennsylvania before me, John James McCahen an alderman and ex-officio Justice of the Peace Personally appeared John Russell, who being by me duly sworn according to law doth depose and say That he will well and faithfully execute the office of Commissioner of Deeds for the State of Kentucky to the best of his ability and capacity, with honor and fidelity and further saith not
Sworn and subscribed to before me this second day of July AD 1864

Comr Deeds
Pennsylvania
John Russell
apptd.
6th July/64
